statement.p: What is the solution to \displaystyle{36}={8}{x}+{4}? Preview Question 1 Â

solution.p: \displaystyle{36}={8}{x}+{4}. We undo the \displaystyle+{4} by subtracting from both sides.
\displaystyle{32}={8}{x}. We undo the multiplication by \displaystyle{8} by dividing by \displaystyle{8} on both sides.
